#### Description 

Shorcut to make a bar chart

####  Usage 
<pre><code>
hcbar(x, ...)
</code></pre> 

#### Arguments 
 

* ``x ``: A character or factor vector.
* `` ...``: Aditional arguments for the data series (http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#series).
